comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Adamo Didur (1874-1946), Polish-born opera singer with a long career at the Met; this picture seems to be from the debut of this particular opera in New York, in 1913: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adamo_Didur

comment.author: 12256380@N03
comment._content: Correct name would be Adam Didur. pl.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adam_Didur

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thank you for the information. Will submit for review and possible update to the catalog record.
